issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
connect_iscsitarget_main.pl runs {{virsh secret-undefine <SECRET>}} and {{virsh secret-define --file /dev/stdin}}, when SELinux is enabled it fails to open the {{/dev/stdin}} file.

{code}
Failed to run 'virsh secret-define --file /dev/stdin': error: Failed to open file '/dev/stdin': Permission denied
{code}

*AVC and SYSCALL*
{code}
----
time->Tue Oct 25 15:52:26 2016
type=SYSCALL msg=audit(1477435946.009:1276): arch=c000003e syscall=2 success=no exit=-13 a0=7f5df22ea2d0 a1=0 a2=7ffcd1941238 a3=1 items=0 ppid=27427 pid=27432 auid=4294967295 uid=0 gid=0 euid=0 suid=0 fsuid=0 egid=0 sgid=0 fsgid=0 tty=(none) ses=4294967295 comm="virsh" exe="/usr/bin/virsh" subj=system_u:system_r:virsh_t:s0 key=(null)
type=AVC msg=audit(1477435946.009:1276): avc:  denied  { open } for  pid=27432 comm="virsh" path="pipe:[201323]" dev="pipefs" ino=201323 scontext=system_u:system_r:virsh_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:system_r:eucalyptus_node_t:s0 tclass=fifo_file
----
time->Tue Oct 25 15:56:47 2016
type=SYSCALL msg=audit(1477436207.008:1353): arch=c000003e syscall=2 success=yes exit=10 a0=7f8a1640c2d0 a1=0 a2=7ffd48d92c38 a3=3 items=0 ppid=29545 pid=29550 auid=4294967295 uid=0 gid=0 euid=0 suid=0 fsuid=0 egid=0 sgid=0 fsgid=0 tty=(none) ses=4294967295 comm="virsh" exe="/usr/bin/virsh" subj=system_u:system_r:virsh_t:s0 key=(null)
type=AVC msg=audit(1477436207.008:1353): avc:  denied  { open } for  pid=29550 comm="virsh" path="pipe:[221250]" dev="pipefs" ino=221250 scontext=system_u:system_r:virsh_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:system_r:eucalyptus_node_t:s0 tclass=fifo_file
{code}

*nc.log*
{code}
2016-10-25 15:52:25  INFO 000014801 doAttachVolume           | [i-7918d27a][vol-3a161c24] attaching volume
2016-10-25 15:52:25 DEBUG 000014801 doAttachVolume           | [i-7918d27a][vol-3a161c24] volume attaching (remoteDev=sc://vol-3a161c24,eGxft9yOqHVmfqbFqx7u5jOVxndT+5q6q+zF+JF0PkdqePqEHqPY
dTfm7Uc9fsx3wMe5mdmPXxO5CINAcmpFYnKE0EQWwbcPGiXjHAkjMoTPhuZ2U8JgsHUUzehU2iMKOL2dvz2iajuV5BegYrctmIlrBYhJSQjBCaVZeeZyFKlfFqRYxVmuKrCeKGEx4aNRMtksFPWP+hzPeGzUqGgI8fLkY11sBw+wBIlBGAMW530an2qK
48zHfmfTVOQhZ2CNwBUmPOakQ05eMuvqzlvDCs+2WNf6QeaALLnH67EfJet/+SWIngVECdFRfy3VY/JVX5bnHsp2CQpcwddcraD+iA== localDev=/dev/vdc)
2016-10-25 15:52:25 DEBUG 000014801 scClientCall             |  done scOps=ExportVolume clientrc=0 opFail=0
2016-10-25 15:52:25 DEBUG 000014801 connect_iscsi_target     | invoking `//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap //usr/share/eucalyptus/connect_iscsitarget.pl /,vol-3a161c24,vdc,euca-vol-3a161c
24-dev-vdc,virtio,qauser,/etc/ceph/ceph.client.qauser.keyring,/etc/ceph/ceph.conf,rbd,ceph,,,eucaqa_vol/vol-3a161c24,95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172,,,`
2016-10-25 15:52:26 DEBUG 000014801 connect_iscsi_target     | connect script returned: 1, stdout: '', stderr: 'Found rbd as protocol in connection string
Failed to run virsh secret-get-value 95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172: error: failed to get secret '95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172'
 error: Secret not found: no secret with matching uuid '95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172'


Failed to run 'virsh secret-undefine 95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172': error: failed to get secret '95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172'
 error: Secret not found: no secret with matching uuid '95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172'

Failed to run 'virsh secret-define --file /dev/stdin': error: Failed to open file '/dev/stdin': Permission denied

'
2016-10-25 15:52:26 ERROR 000014801 connect_ebs_volume       | Failed to connect to EBS target: rbd,ceph,,,eucaqa_vol/vol-3a161c24,95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172,,,
2016-10-25 15:52:26 DEBUG 000014801 cleanup_volume_attachmen | [vol-3a161c24] attempting to disconnect iscsi target
2016-10-25 15:52:26 DEBUG 000014801 disconnect_iscsi_target  | invoking `//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap //usr/share/eucalyptus/disconnect_iscsitarget.pl /,,,,,,,,rbd,ceph,,,eucaqa_vol/vol-3a161c24,95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172,,, norescan`
2016-10-25 15:52:26 DEBUG 000014801 disconnect_iscsi_target  | disconnect script returned: 0, stdout: '', stderr: 'Found rbd as protocol in connection string, disconnecting is a no-op
'
2016-10-25 15:52:26 DEBUG 000014801 scClientCall             |  done scOps=UnexportVolume clientrc=0 opFail=0
2016-10-25 15:52:26 DEBUG 000014801 get_iscsi_target         | invoking `//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap //usr/share/eucalyptus/get_iscsitarget.pl /,,,,,,,,rbd,ceph,,,eucaqa_vol/vol-3a161c24,95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172,,,`
2016-10-25 15:52:26 DEBUG 000014801 get_iscsi_target         | get storage script returned: 0, stdout: 'no-op', stderr: 'Found rbd as protocol in connection string, getting target is a no-op
'
2016-10-25 15:52:26 ERROR 000014801 connect_ebs              | Error connecting ebs volume sc://vol-3a161c24,
2016-10-25 15:52:26 ERROR 000014801 ncAttachVolumeMarshal    | [i-7918d27a][vol-3a161c24] failed error=1
{code}


Once I set the SELinux from {{enforcing}} to {{permissive}} and tried to attach the volume again, the volume was attached.
{code}
2016-10-25 15:56:46  INFO 000014801 doAttachVolume           | [i-7918d27a][vol-3a161c24] attaching volume
2016-10-25 15:56:46 DEBUG 000014801 doAttachVolume           | [i-7918d27a][vol-3a161c24] volume attaching (remoteDev=sc://vol-3a161c24,QFWMFjr/2WMKoUnWEwBEDz5MhCwDvYyUKr1FcSuVojwByODZFgi+
P3HSPIe+6m5b5M6VqfFm2QryDqWgwgUTmLzhcbk1gYyn+dh/y6p9/1DBDGZ8DyKiz2ykkZrPhWdyIjEg4vc0t+xPVDBu59/0ePmRrNzkfLOCdLvRazlR6Y5Cm00TIGJndKldtypiv4R7k0XIgvGXm4JibIRQkyQ/HV6VXML+HWwkSr2HKyVDJMuPHRbU
1ZwL9Od8TvSH1QTfzwTgMqNbisb21D0b8ND4Zm/NBNNPT66ZqqM9emp/vtDdJOMScoslq5iC/eAR6Yb05EG4SCqM3BveM7uuhQ8zDQ== localDev=/dev/vdc)
2016-10-25 15:56:46 DEBUG 000014801 scClientCall             |  done scOps=ExportVolume clientrc=0 opFail=0
2016-10-25 15:56:46 DEBUG 000014801 connect_iscsi_target     | invoking `//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap //usr/share/eucalyptus/connect_iscsitarget.pl /,vol-3a161c24,vdc,euca-vol-3a161c
24-dev-vdc,virtio,qauser,/etc/ceph/ceph.client.qauser.keyring,/etc/ceph/ceph.conf,rbd,ceph,,,eucaqa_vol/vol-3a161c24,95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172,,,`
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 connect_iscsi_target     | connect script returned: 0, stdout: '<disk type='network' device='disk'>
  <source protocol='rbd' name='eucaqa_vol/vol-3a161c24'>
    <host name='10.111.5.124' port='6789'/>
    <host name='10.111.5.121' port='6789'/>
    <host name='10.111.5.129' port='6789'/>
  </source>
  <auth username='qauser'>
    <secret type='ceph' uuid='95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172'/>
  </auth>
  <target bus='virtio' dev='vdc'/>
  <serial>euca-vol-3a161c24-dev-vdc</serial>
</disk>
', stderr: 'Found rbd as protocol in connection string
Failed to run virsh secret-get-value 95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172: error: failed to get secret '95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172'
 error: Secret not found: no secret with matching uuid '95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172'


Failed to run 'virsh secret-undefine 95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172': error: failed to get secret '95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172'
 error: Secret not found: no secret with matching uuid '95621174-43d0-4eae-9a94-eddb6c237172'

'
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 connect_ebs              | [i-7918d27a][vol-3a161c24] attached EBS target
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 find_or_alloc_sd         | allocated new sensor dimension summation:vol-3a161c24
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 sensor_set_dimension_ali | set alias for sensor dimension i-7918d27a:DiskReadOps:summation:vol-3a161c24 to 'vdc'
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 find_or_alloc_sd         | allocated new sensor dimension summation:vol-3a161c24

2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 find_or_alloc_sd         | allocated new sensor dimension summation:vol-3a161c24
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 sensor_set_dimension_ali | set alias for sensor dimension i-7918d27a:DiskWriteBytes:summation:vol-3a161c24 to 'vdc'
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 find_or_alloc_sd         | allocated new sensor dimension summation:vol-3a161c24

2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 find_or_alloc_sd         | allocated new sensor dimension summation:vol-3a161c24
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 sensor_set_dimension_ali | set alias for sensor dimension i-7918d27a:VolumeTotalWriteTime:summation:vol-3a161c24 to 'vdc'
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 find_or_alloc_sd         | allocated new sensor dimension summation:vol-3a161c24
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 sensor_set_dimension_ali | set alias for sensor dimension i-7918d27a:VolumeQueueLength:summation:vol-3a161c24 to 'vdc'
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 find_or_alloc_sd         | allocated new sensor dimension latest:vol-3a161c24
2016-10-25 15:56:47 DEBUG 000014801 sensor_set_dimension_ali | set alias for sensor dimension i-7918d27a:VolumeQueueLength:latest:vol-3a161c24 to 'vdc'
2016-10-25 15:56:47  INFO 000014801 doAttachVolume           | [i-7918d27a][vol-3a161c24] EBS volume attached as guest device 'vdc'
2016-10-25 15:56:51 DEBUG 000014801 doDescribeResource       | Core status:   in-use 3 physical 4 over-committed yes
2016-10-25 15:56:51 DEBUG 000014801 doDescribeResource       | Memory status: in-use 768 physical 7997 over-committed no
2016-10-25 15:56:51 DEBUG 000014801 doDescribeResource       | returning status=enabled cores=29/32 mem=7229/7997 disk=47/62 iqn=iqn.1994-05.com.redhat:adeff1e5736a
2016-10-25 15:56:51 DEBUG 000014801 doDescribeInstances      | invoked userId=eucalyptus correlationId=UNSET epoch=25 services[0]{.name=10.111.5.81 .type=autoscalingbackend .uris[0]=http://10.111.5.81:8773/services/AutoScalingBackend}
2016-10-25 15:56:51 DEBUG 000014801 doDescribeInstances      | [i-58682a76] Extant (running) pub=0.0.0.0 vols=
2016-10-25 15:56:51 DEBUG 000014801 doDescribeInstances      | [i-7918d27a] Extant (running) pub=0.0.0.0 vols=vol-3a161c24:A
{code}

The again I set the SELinux mode to {{enforcing}}, and could attach the new and old volumes to new and old instances properly on the same NC.
fields.summary: volume attachment failure with ceph-rbd, virsh fails to open file /dev/stdin

comments.body: Let's see if this affects 4.3.1 code. [~gholms] can add the necessary policy bits, to whichever version.

This also affects 4.3.1,

*Installed Packages*
{code}
Name        : eucalyptus-selinux
Arch        : noarch
Version     : 0.1.14
Release     : 2.el7
Size        : 230 k
Repo        : installed

Name        : eucalyptus-nc
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.3.1
Release     : 0.25135.60.20161027git2ca359f.el7
Size        : 4.0 M
Repo        : installed
{code}
